weather_report:
As the gentle patter of the rain begins its nocturnal symphony, Subiaco rests beneath a canopy of broken clouds that seem to float absentmindedly across the night sky. The air, cool and slightly crisp, hints at renewal, as the showers meander through the sleeping streets. The dawn will find the city with remnants of a dreary prelude, yet there is a softness in this quiet drizzle that promises a subtle charm. A casual observer may find themselves lulled by the rhythmic cadence, while early risers might awaken to a world quietly transformed, glistening with tiny, shimmering droplets. Despite the absence of the sun's radiant warmth today, the diffuse light will melt gently through the cloud cover, painting a serene picture of tranquil gray.

In this calm and mild environment, morning wanderers should dress in comforting layers; light waterproofs and sensible shoes will ward off the rain's lingering caresses and offer comfort in the ambivalent embrace of this spring day. An umbrella, wielded more as a companion than a necessity, may enhance the gentle experience of an outdoor coffee or a leisurely walk around the neighborhood. Perhaps visit an art gallery or settle in at a warm corner café, allowing the pitter-patter of the rain to serve as a soundtrack to your quiet contemplation. There is a unique pleasure in the muted elegance of a rainy day, the kind that invites introspection, cozy indoors, and even the slow turning of a book's pages as the world outside remains in languid motion.
